nodes.text: The Temple of the Stars was a temple in the Yumaou Risoath region of the planet Dathomir. It closely resembled the Blue Leaf Temple on Yavin 4. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Rubina tasked a spacer with retrieving a cache of data cylinders from the temple. The temple was inhabited by creatures called the Blue Forest People and a giant whuffa worm.
